article_text:
Employees being offered positions elsewhere in the organization

Layoffs amount to 2 percent of hospital system’s workforce

Officials say system remains ‘financially healthy’

article_metadata.news-keywords: Novant Health, layoffs, Presbyeterian Medical Center
article_metadata.description: Up to 400 Novant Health employees – or 2 percent of the hospital system’s workforce – will be laid off in coming days as part of a reorganization that began last fall.
article_metadata.title: Up to 400 workers to be laid off in Novant Health reorganization | The Charlotte Observer
